1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Reviews of The Wave (2008) (2 stars), Anja & Viktor - In Sickness and in Health (2008) (4), Bangkok Dangerous (2008) (0) and Happy-Go-Lucky (2008) (4).

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Reviews of Ticket to Romance (2008) (4 stars), _Arn - Riket vid vägens slut (2008)_ (3), DVD release Reprise (2006) (5) and festival shorts Farlige Film, and an interview with Christian Monggaard about Lars von Trier's Antichrist (2009).

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Reviews of Journey to Saturn (2008) (3 stars), You Don't Mess with the Zohan (2008) (1), Slacker Uprising (2007) (Slacker Uprising) (3), Brideshead Revisited (2008) (4) and Opium: Diary of a Madwoman (2007) (2).

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Reviews of Eagle Eye (2008) (4 stars), Father of Four: Home Field Advantage (2008) (2), Mirush (2007) (3), Babylon A.D. (2008) (1) and Gomorrah (2008) (5).

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Reviews of Burn After Reading (2008) (5 stars), Disco ormene (2008) (2), Righteous Kill (2008) (2), Tropic Thunder (2008) (5) and D.A.D.: True Believer (2008) (3). Also includes film news with a report from the secretive shooting of Lars von Trier's Antichrist (2009).

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Reviews of Terribly Happy (2008) (4 stars), High School Musical 3: Senior Year (2008) (1), Ben X (2007) (3) and Redacted (2007) (5).

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Reviews of Miss Pettigrew Lives for a Day (2008) (3 stars), Max Payne (2008) (2), Saw V (2008) (reviewed only on the basis of the four previous movies) and DVD release Eye for Eye (2008) (4).

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Reviews of The Fox & the Child (2007) (5 stars), Getting Home (2007) (3), Everlasting Moments (2008) (5), _The Strangers (2008)_ (5).

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Reviews of Quantum of Solace (2008) (3 stars), Where Is Winky's Horse? (2007) (1), Same Old Story (2008) (4) and Troubled Water (2008) (4), along with a report from the Danish opening of Quantum of Solace.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Mikkel Munch-Fals reviews Little Soldier (2008) (4 stars), Vicky Cristina Barcelona (2008) (5) and Lakeview Terrace (2008) (3), and Ole Michelsen reviews A Christmas Tale (2008) (5).

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Reviews of Death Race (2008) (2 stars), All My Friends Are Leaving Brisbane (2007) (1), Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa (2008) (4), The Man Who Loved Yngve (2008) (5).

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Reviews of The Boy in the Striped Pajamas (2008) (4 stars), _Le fils de l'épicier (2007)_ (3), Amazing Grace (2006) (3), Body of Lies (2008) (4), Towelhead (2007) (Towelhead) (5). Also news of the upcoming European Film Awards in Copenhagen.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Reviews of W. (2008) (4 stars), Max Embarrassing (2008) (4), Four Christmases (2008) (1), Sounds of Sand (2006) (4) and Quarantine (2008) (3).

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Reviews of The Day the Earth Stood Still (2008) (3 stars), The Flight Before Christmas (2008) (4), RocknRolla (2008) (4), Wild Child (2008) (2) and Quiet Chaos (2008) (4).

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Reviews of Let the Right One In (2008) (5 stars), Beverly Hills Chihuahua (2008) (2), Mamma Mu och Kråkan (2008) (2), Fear Me Not (2008) (2), Yes Man (2008) (4), Australia (2008) (3) and _Elegy (2008)_ (4).

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: A New Year's special looking back at the past season and pointing out the best (Tropic Thunder (2008), Gomorrah (2008), The Man Who Loved Yngve (2008), Let the Right One In (2008)) and the worst films (Opium: Diary of a Madwoman (2007), High School Musical 3: Senior Year (2008), Death Race (2008)) since the show started.

17.title: Episode #3.17
17.plot: A New Year's special looking back at the past season and it's many hosts.

1.title: Episode #4.1
1.plot: Movieclip from Blockbuster film in 2010 as Sex and the City 2 (2010), Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time (2010) and Iron Man 2 (2010). Movieclip from fantasy film in 2010 as Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief (2010) and _Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows: Part I (2010)_. Movieclip from remakes in 2010 as Clash of the Titans (2010) , Brothers (2009) and _Alice in Wonderland (2010)_. Movieclip from Danish films in 2010 The Woman Who Dreamed of a Man (2010), Everything Will be Fine (2010), In a Better World (2010), Submarino (2010) and Nothing's All Bad (2010). Movieclip from 2010 surprises as Up in the Air (2009), Where the Wild Things Are (2009) and Kick-Ass (2010).

2.title: Episode #4.2
2.plot: Reviews of The Woman Who Dreamed of a Man (2010) (6 stars), It's Complicated (2009) (3 stars), Daybreakers (2009) (1 star), _Das weisse Band - Eine deutsche Kindergeschichte (2009)_ (4 stars), Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs (2009) (5 stars), Nine (2009) (2 stars).

3.title: Episode #4.3
3.plot: Reviews of Up in the Air (2009) (3 stars), Everything Will be Fine (2010) (4 stars), The Stepfather (2009) (1 star), _The Road (2009)_ (4 stars).

4.title: Episode #4.4
4.plot: Reviews of Edge of Darkness (2010) (3 stars), Father of Four - In Japanese Mode (2010) (2 stars) and Mary and Max (2009) (5 stars).

5.title: Episode #4.5
5.plot: Reviews of The Princess and the Frog (2009) (5 stars), Precious (2009) (2 stars) and _Chanel Coco & Igor Stravinsky (2009)_ (2 stars).

6.title: Episode #4.6
6.plot: Reviews of Percy Jackson & the Olympians: The Lightning Thief (2010) (1 star), Burrowing (2009) (4 stars), In the Loop (2009) (3 stars), _Valentine's Day (2010)_ (2 stars) and Shutter Island (2010) (5 stars).

11.title: Episode #4.11
11.plot: Reviews of Green Zone (2010) (3 stars), Karla & Jonas (2010) (1 star), How to Train Your Dragon (2010) (5 stars), Submarino (2010) (6 stars) and _The Ghost Writer (2010)_ (6 stars).

12.title: Episode #4.12
12.plot: Reviews of _The Bounty Hunter (2009)_ (1 star), Valhalla Rising (2009) (4 stars), Brotherhood (2009) (4 stars) and Machan (2008) (5 stars).

plot: Weekly reviews of new movies in Danish cinemas.::Peter Brandt Nielsen
